citations.narrative:
The roof of the three sided shelter structure in the cattle and yak enclosure collapsed earlier in the year and the remaining
structure is in a state of disrepair. The shelter is no longer structurally sound and can pose an injury hazard if nails or
sharp points and edges are present. Additionally, there is a wooden feed trough that is also in a state of disrepair. Though
the trough is no longer used to feed the cattle and yak, it can also be an injury hazard if sharp points or nails are exposed.
The facility must remove, repair, or replace the above mentioned items in the cattle and yak enclosure to protect the
animals from injury. Correct by September 10, 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Facility Representatives.
n

narrative:
3.125(a) 
   
Facilities, general. 
The roof of the three sided shelter structure in the cattle and yak enclosure collapsed earlier in the year and the remaining 
structure is in a state of disrepair. The shelter is no longer structurally sound and can pose an injury hazard if nails or 
sharp points and edges are present. Additionally, there is a wooden feed trough that is also in a state of disrepair. Though 
the trough is no longer used to feed the cattle and yak, it can also be an injury hazard if sharp points or nails are exposed. 
The facility must remove, repair, or replace the above mentioned items in the cattle and yak enclosure to protect the 
animals from injury. Correct by September 10, 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Facility Representatives.
